comment: Smart Data Models - IndoorAirConditioner schema adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.ZEB/master/IndoorAirConditioner/schema.json
description: Information on IndoorAirConditioner (maker, model, specification, etc.).

contents.name: airSupplyQuantitiyCooling
contents.comment: Air supply quantitiy when cooling of this item.

contents.name: airSupplyQuantitiyHeating
contents.comment: Air supply quantitiy when heating of this item.

contents.name: airSupplyQuantitiyHigh
contents.comment: Air supply quantitiy when set amount of wind is high of this item.

contents.name: airSupplyQuantitiyLow
contents.comment: Air supply quantitiy when set amount of wind is low of this item.

contents.name: airSupplyQuantitiyMiddle
contents.comment: Air supply quantitiy when set amount of wind is middle of this item.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: capacityCooling
contents.comment: Capacity cooling of this item.

contents.name: capacityHeating
contents.comment: Capacity heating of this item.

contents.name: classificationCode
contents.comment: Classification code of this item.

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: dateObjectCreated
contents.comment: The registration date and time of this item as an object.

contents.name: dateObjectUpdated
contents.comment: The update date and time of this item as an object.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: dryBulbTemperatureIndoorCooling
contents.comment: Indoor dry bulb temperature when cooling.

contents.name: dryBulbTemperatureIndoorHeating
contents.comment: Indoor dry bulb temperature when heating.

contents.name: dryBulbTemperatureOutdoorCooling
contents.comment: Outdoor dry bulb temperature when cooling.

contents.name: dryBulbTemperatureOutdoorHeating
contents.comment: Outdoor dry bulb temperature when heating.

contents.name: flagDeleted
contents.comment: Flag set when this item is deleted as an object.

contents.name: groupNumber
contents.comment: Group number of this item.

contents.name: idMaker
contents.comment: Makerid of this item.

contents.name: idModel
contents.comment: Model id or number of this item.

contents.name: mnetAddress
contents.comment: Mnet address of this item.

contents.name: motorOutput
contents.comment: Fan motor output of this item.

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item

contents.name: objectName
contents.comment: Name of this item as an object.

contents.name: powerConsumptionCooling
contents.comment: Power consumption when cooling of this item.

contents.name: powerConsumptionHeating
contents.comment: Power consumption when heating of this item.

contents.name: powerFrequency
contents.comment: Power frequency of this item.

contents.name: price
contents.comment: Price of this item.

contents.name: serialNumber
contents.comment: Serial number of this item.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object

contents.name: specName
contents.comment: Name of this item.

contents.name: wetBulbTemperatureIndoorCooling
contents.comment: Indoor wet bulb temperature when cooling.

contents.name: wetBulbTemperatureOutdoorHeating
contents.comment: Outdoor wet bulb temperature when heating.

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: refAirConditionerTerminal
contents.comment: Reference to the air conditioner terminal containing this item.

contents.name: refElectricPowerEquipment
contents.comment: Reference to the electric power equipment containing this item.

contents.name: refGatewayController
contents.comment: Reference to the gateway controller containing this item.

contents.name: refIndoorAirConditionerMeasurement
contents.comment: Reference to the indoor air conditioner measurement containing this item.

contents.name: refIndoorAirConditionerMentenanceMeasurement
contents.comment: Reference to the indoor air conditioner mentenance measurement containing this item.

contents.name: refOutdoorAirConditioner
contents.comment: Reference to the outdoor air conditioner containing this item.

contents.name: refSensor
contents.comment: Reference to the sensor containing this item.

contents.name: refSpace
contents.comment: Reference to the space containing this item.

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
